select IFNULL(sum(amount),0) from invest where loan_id = #{loanId} and status = 'SUCCESS'
select count(1) from invest where loan_id = #{loanId} and status = '${status}'

select loan.periods,loan.name as loan_name, u.mobile, u.email, invest.amount,invest.id as invest_id from invest inner join loan on invest.loan_id = loan.id inner join user u on u.login_name = invest.login_name where loan.id = #{loanId} and invest.status = 'SUCCESS'
select IFNULL(sum(amount),0) from invest where loan_id = #{loanId} and login_name = #{loginName} and status = 'SUCCESS'
